html:
2.2.21  4:38 pm   can I get punished in Antarctica, just like you did in wild frolicking adventures of informational education?

      you are limited only by your imagination

2.2.21  4:31 pm   love the funky chords, why did you start doing them in the first place? they pretty cool

      which ones were you thinking are the funky ones

2.2.21  4:14 pm   what aspect ratio will the next song be in

      about 3min22sec by -14LUFS

2.2.21  3:30 pm   How to stop overthinking everything?

      challenge yourself to think 10x more. this will exhaust you and make you want to relax

2.2.21  2:04 pm   Are you a time traveller?

      time is required, for travel

2.2.21  1:54 pm   Whats that thing on my ceiling?

      could be some dreams

2.2.21  1:35 pm   I have a music class and we're doing music theory but its not going well and half the time I'm lost, like I understand the concepts, I use them all the time, I can already play multiple instruments but writing it down is the hard part, I've just been limping through each class. I know I can do it its just hard. Anyway how are you doing

      what you gotta do is just get your hands on the class books, and go through them at home, by yourself. i'm sure you already know everything that's in them. just go through all the things at a keyboard, and you'll see what they're calling things

2.2.21  1:25 pm   What's your favorite guitar fret?

      1st

2.2.21  1:25 pm   how do you write lyrics?

      musically

2.2.21  12:01 pm   is the song for your next video already on the website

      no

2.2.21  11:44 am   in the big keyboard solo in la de day oh, purposefully avoid F# except for once at the end. why is that?

      it's just the same as the way you purposefully avoid the letter 'w' except once at the end

2.2.21  11:26 am   if i want to listen to trap music with lots of bass but don't want the higher frequency drums to hurt my ears can i just EQ higher freq? what's your reccomendation

      put a 'high cut' on the high frequencies. lower the volume of the high frequencies. or just raise the volume of the lower frequencies

2.2.21  11:17 am   how groovy will your next song be

      feels like a train ride on the beach...... in space

2.2.21  11:07 am   How did you come up with "New Canaan}?

      of all the towns i could visit by train, on the map, it looked fairly tasty

2.2.21  10:26 am   this is not a question but capital letters are cringe

      sometimes they are just the ticket

2.2.21  9:32 am   you always say you would prefer to make. anew song to be your favorite and here comes the sun is new so does that mean it's your favorite?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

2.2.21  9:14 am   Since you have a stockpile of songs you've written a while back, Do you often get surprised when you rediscover songs that you forgot you even wrote?

      yes

2.2.21  9:05 am   would you write a song in locrian?

      the thing about actual locrian, is it's just gonna sound like the ionion next door, that would have been

2.2.21  9:04 am   how many times is the letter M in your upcoming video

      mmmmmmmmmmany

2.2.21  8:40 am   how do i start my book? how do i create a good start/sentance?

      how about starting with several blank pages

2.2.21  6:35 am   How do I get inspired?

      have you considered taking a walk on the wild side

2.2.21  5:22 am   are there any songs you don't want to finish/record because you can't do a particular thing in a video

      no

2.2.21  4:32 am   what is the second word in your next song?

      a

2.2.21  3:17 am   how many harmonic modulations in the new song?

      almost none

2.2.21  2:42 am   what do you think about playing cover songs/standards?

     i think that's a great idea

      is creating your own original music more creative and advanced?

     any song can be as creative or advanced as you chooce

     you have some nice recordings of you playing jazz, so it appears that you have experience with both :)

      there are about 10,000 cover songs that i would really like to do, to the same level of production i would normally do for the songs page. i am very eager to do this but i always feel like i haven't learned to make original songs fast enough

2.2.21  12:35 am   Do you read any good books?

      i read a lot of non-books

2.1.21  11:08 pm   thoughts on the stars?

      they are a long time ago

2.1.21  10:41 pm   What's Steve's real name?

      steve. everyone's real name is steve

2.1.21  10:25 pm   how do you make things so original

      basically it's like chips. the 'original' flavor is obtained when you remove all flavor whatsoever

2.1.21  9:44 pm   how do you do it? how are you just so chill?

      by following every rule and regulation exactly

2.1.21  9:25 pm   Are you gonna make anymore songs in 2021

      yes

2.1.21  9:24 pm   How do I get inspired?

      open a door. like actually try to access the inside of the door

2.1.21  9:13 pm   opinion on peanut butter

      i always confuse it with beanut putter

2.1.21  8:45 pm   what time signature will your next song mostly be in?

      regular

2.1.21  8:25 pm   How can I turn melodies or ideas into finished songs?

      first turn it into a partial song. ask yourself questions about it. play "what do we know". is this the beginning? is it the chorus? is it both? is it neither? what does and doesn't seem to work after it? what does and doesn't seem to work before it? spend a little time thinking about this, and then save your findings

2.1.21  6:48 pm   What is the most normal thing?

      how about going directly to the center of outer space

2.1.21  6:34 pm   what inspired the conversation between the chairs in 'here comes the sun'?

      the line at that part of the song is "we speak to ourselves". and i already had chairs on screen

2.1.21  5:35 pm   bill you always say the genre of your songs are "normal"...

will any in the future be "weird"?

      new flash: normal is weird

2.1.21  5:21 pm   Are your songs normal?

      yes

2.1.21  5:05 pm   Is your shift key working properly?

      yes

2.1.21  4:22 pm   Is it acceptable to use dorian too often?

      that depends if once every 5 minutes is too often

2.1.21  3:16 pm   how many times is the word "love" mentioned in your next song?

      1 time

2.1.21  3:13 pm   Will there be any glockenspiel in your next song

      yes

2.1.21  3:07 pm   what do you think qualifies someone as an artist?

     doing art

     asking for my self

2.1.21  2:33 pm   what originally were the lyrics after "no stranger to falling in love" before the bridge was rewritten to be shorter?

      the bridge was never rewritten to be shorter. that line used to be the last line of the bridge

2.1.21  12:57 pm   I have a drum loop that I've made at 108.99 bpm that I need to make a song out of. How can I make a melody come to my head when I hear the drum loop? So far nothing has come out.

      try imagining some words. actually i would take it a step further, try imagining some entire situations

2.1.21  12:27 pm   if a raisin is thrown into a lake, does it still count as a dry fruit

      now it's a wet dry fruit

2.1.21  11:52 am   how many time signature changes are in your upcoming song?

      none

2.1.21  11:37 am   What should I do today?

      how about a pyramid scheme

      you could try sending yourself an email
